com.collabnet.ccf.core.utils
Class XmlValidator

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.core.Component
      com.collabnet.ccf.core.utils.XmlValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.openadaptor.core.IComponent, org.openadaptor.core.IDataProcessor, org.openadaptor.core.jmx.Administrable
public class XmlValidator
extends org.openadaptor.core.Component
implements org.openadaptor.core.IDataProcessor

Validates each record (assumed to be an XML document in string form or dom4j record) against the schema defined in the configuration file.

By default the schema URL is verified during the initialisation phase. For web based schemas this may take a while. You can turn this feature off by setting the forcingURLValidation property to be false

This processor uses the Xerces parser and requires the following jars to be in the classpath - xerces.jar, xml-apis.jar

Author:
Russ Fennell

Take the record, ensure it's a string or dom4j document and validate it against the schema defined in the config file.

Specified by:
process in interface org.openadaptor.core.IDataProcessor
Parameters:

Returns:
Object[] with zero or more records, resulting from the processing operation.
Throws:
org.openadaptor.core.exception.RecordException - if the record is not a string or dom4j document or does not contain valid XML or if it fails to be validated against the schema
